title: Hypothermia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Inflict someone's visitors with Hypothermia. If they are attacked, you will roleblock their attacker(s).
-**Lethal Cold**  Turn a player's nighttime ability into a Basic Attack tonight, roleblock all players who attack tonight, then coldsnap. You may only use this ability once per game.

desc:
Post 1705
*The plank on the Titanic was big enough for both of them, smh.*
